name: read-property-ack
description: Represents a BACnet ReadProperty ACK, used to acknowledge a ReadProperty request and provide the property value.

fields.name: object-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the object being read.

fields.name: property-identifier
fields.description: The property identifier specifying the property being read.

fields.name: property-array-index
fields.description: Optional array index for the property.

fields.name: property-value
fields.description: The value of the property being read.
